thread.title: BRIEF-Textron Says Business Confidence Is Strong And People Are Looking To Invest - Conf Call‍​

title: BRIEF-Textron Says Business Confidence Is Strong And People Are Looking To Invest - Conf Call‍​
text:
April 18, 2018 / 3:25 PM / Updated 22 minutes ago BRIEF-Textron Says Business Confidence Is Strong And People Are Looking To Invest - Conf Call‍​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 18 (Reuters) - Textron Inc: 
* TEXTRON INC SAYS CONTINUES TO WORK TOWARDS LONGITUDE AIRCRAFT CERTIFICATION, WHICH IS EXPECTED LATER IN THE SECOND QUARTER OF 2018- CONF CALL‍​ 
* TEXTRON INC SAYS WILL SEE LOWER MARGIN RATES IN ITS SYSTEMS UNIT THROUGH 2018, COMPARED WITH THE FIRST QUARTER - CONF CALL‍​ 
* TEXTRON INC SAYS HAD STRONG BOOK-TO-BILL ON ITS JET AND TURBOPROP PRODUCT LINES- CONF CALL‍​ 
* TEXTRON INC SAYS BUSINESS CONFIDENCE IS STRONG AND PEOPLE ARE LOOKING TO INVEST - CONF CALL‍​ 
* TEXTRON INC SAYS MARKET DEMAND CONTINUES TO BE STRONG FOR BUSINESS JETS AND TURBOPROPS, AND IT IS REFLECTED IN CO’S BOOK-TO-BILL AND BACKLOG - CONF CALL‍​ Further company coverage:
